NK103(pe)021:1: // rdzogs chen klong dgu'i rgyud dang de'i man ngag phyogs
NK103(pe)021:2: rtogs dang bcas pa'i 'og gi dri ma srung byed
NK103(pe)021:3: kyi ldeb g.yog zla ba'i par khab bzhugs /
NK103(pe)021:4: gang 'dir rdzogs pa chen po klong dgu'i pu sti
NK103(pe)021:5: se bna 'byung ldan gyis mchan du btab pa 'di
NK103(pe)021:6: / kahthoga si tu chos kyi rgya mtshos bod phyogs
NK103(pe)021:7: nas gdan drangs pa'i yig bris dbu med mtshan nyid
NK103(pe)021:8: pa deng sang 'bru tsha zhes grags pa'i dpe khungs
NK103(pe)021:10: mkhan chen mkhyen brtse blo gros kyi phyag dpe ru
NK103(pe)021:11: gus slob o di'i ming can nas sngar gyi brda
NK103(pe)021:12: dag dper na glong rdeng stsogs zhes pa'i rigs rnams
NK103(pe)021:13: brda gsar du byas pa las gzhan ma dpe ji
NK103(pe)021:14: ltar lhag chad med par rmugs sangs ri khrod du
NK103(pe)021:15: bris pa dge / de lta'i legs byas dge tshogs gang+ga'i rgyun //
NK103(pe)021:16: rnam mkhyen sku bzhi'i rgya mtshor drangs pa'i mod //
NK103(pe)021:17: nad mug mtshon 'khrug rba rlabs rang zhi nas //
